了解脑损伤的症状，诊断和治疗车祸。足球铲球。不幸的秋天。这些事情以及更多的东西可能会造成头部受伤。任何年龄的人都可能发生头部受伤，并且会损害大脑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/understanding-the-symptoms-dingnosis-and-woreatment-of-traumatic-brain-brain-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/understanding-the-symptoms-dingnosis-and-woreatment-of-traumatic-brain-brain-brain-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff6ad3d4-a3d3-4418-a93c-47e9d7876c9a Mon, 10 Mar 2025 11:59:59 -0400 Understanding the symptoms, diagnosis, and treatment of traumatic brain injury
研究深入研究了Sox9在Hypospadias发育中的作用Hypospadias是一种普遍存在的先天性疾病，其特征是尿道开口的异常位置，影响了全球多达3.42％的男性。除了身体后果之外，这种情况还会导致心理和生育问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/study-delves-into-the-the-the-po--sox9-in-hypospadias-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/study-delves-into-the-the-the-po--sox9-in-hypospadias-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc92b3b0-6b56-4135-9a24-5451de56c49a Mon, 10 Mar 2025 10:50:29 -0400 Study delves into the role of SOX9 in hypospadias development
通过改进的舞会增强小儿健康评估由于认知能力，语言技能和发展阶段，儿童的健康评估与成年人的差异很大。由患者报告的结果指标（PROM）是自我报告的问卷，可为儿童的健康状况提供宝贵的见解，但他们在儿科的设计和实施很复杂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/enhancing-pediatric-health-evaluations--through-rough-promsprec-proms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/enhancing-pediatric-health-evaluations--through-rough-promsprec-proms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c19e149-727b-49b-49b1-beab-f56f919d24fb Mon, 10 Mar 2025 10:47:54 -0400 Enhancing pediatric health evaluations through improved PROMs
个性化的治疗策略可能是管理小儿花盆的关键姿势体位性心动过速综合征（POTS）是一种慢性体位不耐受的一种形式，主要影响儿童和青少年，导致衰弱的症状，如闪闪发光，视力模糊和站立后的疲劳。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/individualized-warteatment-strategies-may-be-be-the-key-the-the-pe--to-pediatric-pots.aspx.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/individualized-warteatment-strategies-may-be-be-the-key-the-ceme-the-pediatric-pots.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=434263b4-fd52-43b7-bdf6-23e243704898 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 10:41:05 -0400 Individualized treatment strategies may be the key to managing pediatric POTS
许多患有Niemann-Pick疾病的人缺乏针对AAV2或AAV9的中和抗体在同行评审的期刊《人类基因疗法》中的一项新研究表明，经过测试的Niemann-Pick疾病的患者中有超过一半的患者缺乏针对腺相关病毒（AAV）2或AAV9的中和抗体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/many-individuals-with-niemann-pick-disease-lack-neutralized-neutralized-antibodies-antibodies-antibodies-antibodies-avainst-aav2-aav2-aav2-or-aav9-aav9-aav9-a.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/many-individuals-with-niemann-pick-disease-disease-lack-neutralized-neutralise-antibodies-antibodies-antibodies-against-aav2-aav2-aav2-oav2-or-aav9-aav9-aav9-a.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51557BDC-52AF-407F-A4DA-DA-DF5415CE07DB Mon, 10 Mar 2025 10:36:00 -0400 Many individuals with Niemann-Pick disease lack neutralizing antibodies against AAV2 or AAV9
研究将消防化学物质与增加神经胶质瘤风险联系起来一项新的研究发现了暴露于消防和神经胶质瘤风险的化学物质之间的关联，这加强了早期的研究，这表明消防与癌症的发展之间存在联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/study-links-firefighting-vighting-vemicals-to Incred-Glioma-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250310/study-links-firefighting-chemicals-to Incred-to Incred-glioma-glioma-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=116F60C2-5609-40CD-8489-F01D75F332333 Mon, 10 Mar 2025 10:36:00 -0400 Study links firefighting chemicals to increased glioma risk
